sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import * as XLSX from "xlsx" const BatchSlipDetails = () => { const [batchSlips, setBatchSlips] = useState([]) // Mock data for batch slip details const mockBatchSlips = [ { id: 1, batchSlipNo: "BS202312001", date: "2023-12-01", supplier: "ABC Construction Materials", material: "Portland Cement", quantity: "50.00", vehicleNo: "MH12AB1234", status: "Active", }, { id: 2, batchSlipNo: "BS202312002", date: "2023-12-02", supplier: "XYZ Steel Suppliers", material: "TMT Steel Bars", quantity: "100.00", vehicleNo: "MH14CD5678", status: "Completed", }, ] useEffect(() => { const savedBatchSlips = localStorage.getItem("batchSlipDetails") if (savedBatchSlips) { setBatchSlips(JSON.parse(savedBatchSlips)) } else { setBatchSlips(mockBatchSlips) localStorage.setItem("batchSlipDetails", JSON.stringify(mockBatchSlips)) } }, []) const exportToExcel = () => { const worksheet = XLSX.utils.json_to_sheet(batchSlips) const workbook = XLSX.utils.book_new() XLSX.utils.book_append_sheet(workbook, worksheet, "Batch Slip Details") XLSX.writeFile(workbook, "batch_slip_details.xlsx") } return (
📋

Batch Slip Details

{batchSlips.map((slip, index) => ( ))}
S.No Batch Slip No Date Supplier Material Quantity Vehicle No Status Actions
{index + 1} {slip.batchSlipNo} {new Date(slip.date).toLocaleDateString()} {slip.supplier} {slip.material} {slip.quantity} {slip.vehicleNo} {slip.status}
{batchSlips.length === 0 && (

No batch slip details found

)}
) } export default BatchSlipDetails
